title: The things that make some champions better than others
body:
Superior mobility, good to great damage, able to link abilities in devastating combos and yet, are not all that squishy despite this.

These champions win more than others. You know who they are. 

How can Riot balance the game if they don't even seem to know what makes some champions stronger than others?
